mapper.select: select A.* from product A order by p_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (p_no, b_no, p_name_ko, p_name_en, p_size, p_model_no, p_release_date, p_release_price, p_category, p_class, p_brand) values(product_no_seq.nextval, #{b_no}, #{p_name_ko, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_name_en, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_size, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_model_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_release_date}, #{p_release_price}, #{p_category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'shop', #{p_brand, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
